privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.intro: Ramadan Companion is designed with privacy at its core. We believe your worship data is personal and should stay that way.
privacy_page.local_storage_title: Your Data Stays on Your Device
privacy_page.local_storage_desc: All your worship data, habits, goals, and progress are stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. We do not send, collect, or store any of your personal data on any server.
privacy_page.no_accounts_desc: Ramadan Companion does not require registration, login, or any personal information to use. There are no user accounts, emails, or passwords.
privacy_page.no_tracking_desc: We do not use cookies for tracking. If analytics are enabled, they collect only anonymous usage data (page views, feature usage) with no personally identifiable information.
privacy_page.no_third_party_desc: We do not share, sell, or transfer any data to third parties. Your worship journey is entirely private.
privacy_page.pwa_desc: Ramadan Companion works offline as a Progressive Web App (PWA). Once installed, it functions entirely on your device without requiring an internet connection.
privacy_page.export_desc: You can export your data anytime from Settings. To delete all data, use the Reset option in Settings or simply clear your browser's local storage.
privacy_page.contact_desc: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, feel free to reach out via our GitHub repository.

terms_page.title: Terms of Service
terms_page.intro: By using Ramadan Companion, you agree to these simple terms.
terms_page.usage_desc: Ramadan Companion is a free tool designed to help you plan and track your Ramadan worship. You may use it for personal, non-commercial purposes.
terms_page.as_is_desc: This app is provided free of charge, as-is, without any warranties. We do our best to keep it reliable, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted availability.
terms_page.data_desc: All data is stored locally on your device. You are responsible for your own data. We recommend using the Export feature in Settings to back up important data.
terms_page.content_desc: The worship actions and spiritual content provided are general guidance. We encourage you to consult with knowledgeable scholars for specific religious rulings.
terms_page.changes_desc: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

about_page.title: About Ramadan Companion
about_page.intro: Ramadan Companion is a free, open-source tool built to help Muslims plan and stay consistent with their worship during Ramadan.
about_page.mission_desc: We believe that Ramadan is a precious opportunity for spiritual growth. Our goal is to make it easier for everyone to set meaningful worship goals and maintain consistency throughout the blessed month.
about_page.how_it_works_desc: Choose from 25+ curated worship actions or create your own. Check off your daily habits in just 2 minutes. Track your progress with a beautiful hex grid that fills in as you go.
about_page.privacy_first_desc: Your worship data never leaves your device. No accounts, no servers, no tracking. Just you and your ibadah.
about_page.open_source_desc: Ramadan Companion is built with love and shared freely. Contributions and feedback are welcome.
about_page.tech_desc: Astro, React, Tailwind CSS, and deployed on Cloudflare. Designed to be fast, accessible, and work offline as a PWA.
